tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I’m a returning customer of Elite Esthetics & Dental Clinic. I’ve always had a happy & satisfying experience here. This time I went to Dr Aditi Garg to seek help for my dull & pigmented skin . I got a carbon facial done along with nd yag laser treatment for post acne pigmentation. The results were amazing - it gave me clear glowing skin with even tone and lightened my acne pigmentation to a great extent . I felt secured knowing its a FDA approved  laser machine & treatment for my face. Dr Aditi Garg & team made me very comfortable and patiently answered my questions throughout. 

I’d highly recommend Dr Aditi Garg’s Elite Esthetics & Dental Clinic for all your skin & face concerns!
Good treatment and friendly behaviour by the doctor and the clinic staff. Pricing for cleaning of the teeth was also reasonable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: doctor aditi is very friendly and she explained clearly about the treatment plan, i am happy with the treatment
The doctors were friendly and supportive. They understood my problem and explained it thoroughly to me. Walked me through the process and I got to know all about the treatment I was receiving.

I had fractured my front tooth. After reading few reviews(google, practo).I decided to visit Dr Aditi ,Elite Esthetics & Dental Clinic.

My treatment included RCT(tooth filing covered by the clinic) and Crowning.
This was the first time I was visiting a dental clinic for any procedure.The staff was friendly and the clinic was clean .The treatment room was perfect ,not at all scary :).

Dr. Aditi is very professional and kind .Took time to explain everything thoroughly.

All my appointments were on time. Saved a lot of time. The entire RCT procedure and tooth filling was done on the same day by Dr. Jessica and Dr. Aditi.

I had a very great experience and would highly recommend Elite Esthetics & Dental Clinic to anyone seeking top-notch dental care.
Dr Aditi was really friendly, she listens to patients and attendees equally. Her suggestions were also right on the spot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had my wisdom tooth extracted by Dr. Aditi and she was the best dentist I ever had. She’s super friendly and made sure that I was comfortable during my surgery. She was really professional and guided me through the entire operation. Even post surgery, she called me by herself to check on me and made sure I was doing well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
It is very good experience. The way treat the patient is too good. They are very friendly and given good treatment.  And they are taken very less time to finish my treatment and given good result.
And special thanks to Dr. Aditi and staff for completion my dental treatment.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Garg provided exceptional care during my wisdom tooth extraction. Their expertise and precision made the procedure quick and virtually painless. The staff was friendly and attentive, ensuring my comfort throughout. I highly recommend Dr. Garg for anyone in need of dental care, especially for complex procedures like wisdom tooth extraction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

very nice treatment  and  dental clinic is flawless

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was very happy when I was taken in the dental chair on appointed time. My treatment was finished satisfactorily. My complaints were solved . I did not have recurrence. The operatory was neat and clean and instruments were clean and sterile. The doctors were very friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Thank you doctor for  attention to detail in ensuring the best possible patient care. I had issue in old root canal done 20 years ago. Dr Aditi very well explained the issue in details and ensured the right treatment is offered. Dr Bhavana and Dr Jessica carried out the entire re rct and dental filling procedures. The care offered by the doctors and clinic staff was really comforting.

I personally highly recommend Elite Esthetics and dental clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: It was good. No issues as such. She helped with the issue and solved it . Very Professional. The clinic experience was also good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The doctor and all staff were very helpful, friendly and patient throughout the procedure. The instructions were very clear and I could always ask for help when I needed.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went to Elite esthetics clinic first for my hair fall and dandruff problem, which Dr Aditi helped with some home care and hair prp treatment. i could see results even in 1st 2 months. Now i am taking treatment for acne. Dr has advised me 5-6 sittings of chemical peels and microneedling with some serums for home care. I can see an improvement with it too i would say that it has been a very helpful tretment for me . In addition the ambience of the clinic is smooth and very soothing and the staff is courteous. Strongly endorse it .

I have been skeptical about getting anything done for my face as I have a very sensitive skin.  At Elite Esthetics Clinic, Dr Aditi clearly explained out the details and procedures suitable for my skin and the sessions have been very pleasant. I started seeing good results after even one session of hydrafacial and chemical peel and am very happy with the services here.
Dr Aditi is thorough in her examination and also answers questions and doubts clearly before and during the treatment. The clinic is also very clean and hygienic , nd the ambience is soothing and calm. There is almost no waiting time and the staff is well courteous and follow up after the procedure with calls about the post care. Strongly recommend this place for anyone with skin issues. Affordable prices too.

I have visited Elite Aesthetics dental clinic for my father's dental treatment. Dr. Aditi is an excellent doctor. She had explained different options for the dental replacement. She has a lot of patience in listening to our concerns. She had recommended a best option for the dental bridge considering the age of my father. The other specialists who have treated my father at Elite are excellent as well. I would like to thank Dr. Aditi and other specialists who have treated my father at Elite. I would definitely recommend Elite for dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were really worried regarding my son's tooth issues and pains. He is a 9 year old and was really scared to see a dentist, so much so that he had stopped complaining about his tooth pains and difficulties. After hearing about Elite and Doctor Aditi from a friend we visited the clinic in HSR layout. The clinic, the doctor, the level of hygiene and cleanliness,  were all commendable. All my son's tooth issues were explained and dealt with so well that he came out smiling and shocked us. Thankyou Elite and Doctor Aditi. Keep it up. I am writing such a long one, coz I can't thank Elite enough for the wonderful treatment my son got. Thankyou Elite. KEEP IT UP. 
THANKYOU.

I got my front tooth replacement done from Elite Esthetics Dental clinic recently. My Dental Implant treatment was totally hassle free and I felt fully comfortable during all appointments. Dr Aditi explained all steps in detail and all my doubts regarding dental implants was cleared. Regarding the clinic, ambience and hygiene is top class. The staff and Dr Aditi is very professional. I will suggest Elite Esthetics and Dental clinic and Dr Aditi as one of the BEST centers in Banglore for dental Implants.

Aditi is the super cool doctor! She did a complete assessment of my teeth and explained the pro and cons of the her course of action. We agreed 2 wisdom tooth extraction.

The entire procedure was painless, that is because she has a great supporting staff and state of the art tools to make the process very smooth. She has the safest hands and her experience over a decade clearly shows in the way she conducts herself.

After a week of wisdom tooth extraction I was pain free and, I got the Scaling and polishing done. Again a great service and super feeling.

I am very glad that my dental needs are taken care for life!

Thanks Dr. Aditi, your team and the superb set up you have!

Leave with a happy smile, always!
Good doctor but very expensive. Found the rates to be extremely high from what i have done before. Wouldn’t follow up because of the only price reason

review: Doctor Aditi is extremely knowledgeable and experienced. She immediately understood my problem and quickly diagnosed the root cause of my tooth pain. Extremely professional and modern, clean clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got full mouth dental work done, including smile designing and 4 implants. Even thought my bone height was less, Dr Aditi and her team did a superb work. I was completely at ease, Doctor did her work with ease and no hurry. I am very happy and satisfied with the clinic. Would surely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: PRP Hair Transplantation,PRP for Hair Loss,
review:
I visited this clinic to address my hair loss issues, and I am extremely satisfied with the results post the PRP (GFC) sessions. Dr. Aditi Garg took the time to explain to me the entire process in detail addressing all of my concerns. She ensured that strict hygiene was maintained during the entire process along with use of sterilized instruments. The process was absolutely painless! 
Within a few weeks I can already see noticeable changes in my hair quality as well as density. I would highly recommend this clinic to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
One of my best decisions in recent times have been to take my dental issues to Dr. Aditi at  Elite Esthetics & Dental Clinic. i have had chronic dental problems for many years and have had less than satisfactory work done. But this time around , I felt for the first time, what a good patient care looks like. Doctor was very patient with my many different queries, she explained why implants would be better suited to my needs . 
She explained to me the different types of implants, their cost implications and other pros and cons. She also explained to me the treatment procedure , no of sittings. 
All in all, a very positive experience and highly recommend to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Excellent service . I got front 2 implants , I am very happy with my teeth . They look natural . I then also went for hair fall and I see results with medicines and prp. The process is painless and I was very comfortable with  it . Recommend this place for both dental and hair treatments .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Good Experience, Definitely, will recommend to others as well. Explains the treatment plan in detail.

review: Dr. Aditi is extremely experienced *** ******** doctor. She has been with me at each step of my dental procedures. She ensures you are comfortable through the whole process and makes it as painless and seamless for you by adjusting according to YOUR pain threshold. I Had a great experience and would definitely recommend this team to anyone who is looking for a dental appointment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I got Rct, crowns and implants done in the last 1 month . Dr Aditi and her consultants are knowledgeable and professional. They explain the problem clearly and give the options where possible , like for my implants.  Her support staff is also courteous and the clinic is well maintained. I know for sure that my dental problems are taken care of , and i recommend this clinic and Dr Aditi for your dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Since shifting to bangalore ive have hair fall. I went to Dr Aditi Garg and she did a good examination. I took hair prp and some vit injections and in the last 5 months i have seen drastic difference in the hair .The hair fall has reduced and also they seem more thick. Do take a opinion for this clinic in case u have hair issues.

I had visited elite esthetics and dental clinic last month for hydra facial. Dr aditi garg explained what hydra facial is and how it helps rejuvenate our skin. Her communication is superb. Post the facial my face has a renewed glow. 
I recommend everyone to try hydra facial. It no doubt is a good thing for your skin. And Dr Aditi does it pretty well.

Dr Aditi is a fantastic doctor with great communicational skills. She explained dental treatments so carefully. I wanted braces for better teeth alignment and following discussion with her I opted for ceramic braces. I can already see a massive improvement! Thank you so much to the entire team!

I had some teeth missing and I went to Elite esthetics dental clinic for the same. Dr Aditi Garg described in detail about options for the replacement. I liked the concept of dental implants and i got 4 implants done . Dr Aditi has an experienced team and specialists coming for their specialised work. I really liked the personal attention Dr Aditi gives and the way the clinic follows up even after the procedure. it has been 6 months  since the implants and i love my experience with the clinic.
